text:
We have just migrated our Vista application to a Linux 6.5 server has 12gb memory and we are using Orcle as our DB system and are using tomcat 7 ver 7.0.54 and have catalina memory set to 1024 however it is continually failing and getting out of memory issues. we are going to change to 2048 but I am concerned we have memory leak issues. This is a production system that support all of Toys R Us stores and is having a significant impact.
